    Package Description
    org.simplity.gateway  
    org.simplity.kernel.data  
    org.simplity.kernel.db
    classes that deal with rdbms on top of jdbc
    org.simplity.service
    as a client, this is all you need to know as to how to ask the server for a service and get response.

    • Uses of RespWriter in org.simplity.gateway

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JsonObjectRespWriter
      prepares a dynamic JSON Object based on the write commands received.

      prepares a JSON response based on output specifications.

      protobuf based writer.
